hateSpeech: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
counterSpeech: Migration is an important part of modern life. Our country is made of many people, not just one people. To imply that someone says that it is 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.

hateSpeech: Our government has a liberal approach that pretends not to see violence against minors, Islamic radicalisation and so on. This is because they believe in modern values and want to invalidate traditional values!
counterSpeech: These matters are not being ignored. Have you heard that crimes concerning child rapes and radicalisation are prosecuted?

hateSpeech: Jews think they are better than everyone else
counterSpeech: Jews are proud of their culture and identity. Doesn't this apply to every religion?

hateSpeech: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
counterSpeech: The same could be said for all species, but especially about our species: homo sapiens. This is a special case. And people of colour are genetically homo sapiens.

hateSpeech: Jews control the United States of America.
counterSpeech: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.

hateSpeech: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies. We should stop them from their disturbing whining.
counterSpeech: Feminists are human beings, with human rights. They are fighting for these rights all around the world. To think that you can change their minds suggests your misunderstanding of the importance of this fight.

hateSpeech: Mentally disabled folks are gullible.
counterSpeech: We should not judge people for their mental health. It's not a matter of choice for them.

hateSpeech: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
counterSpeech: Just as much as the Bible would. Is your point that in today's society we are all more tolerant? After all, attitudes towards Christians, Jews and Muslims have all moved with the times.

hateSpeech: These 8 criminals are all Muslims because their victims are always white or Non-Muslim!
counterSpeech: They don't, but I wonder why only the crimes with 'White British Non-Muslim' victims are the ones widely circulated?

hateSpeech: Transexuals, queer, and so on... just a rabble of faggots.
counterSpeech: This is not true. Being gay is not synonymous with being bisexual, pansexual, intersex, transgender, queer, deviant, lesbian, tranny, queermetaphysical, or whatever term you want to use... We should try to respect people for who they are instead.

hateSpeech: A girl that was sexually violented reported that her aggressor recited the Koran to excuse his crimes.
counterSpeech: There is never justification for rape. Individuals of all faiths have used their holy texts to justify all sorts of crimes. They carry the blame.

hateSpeech: Islam cannot get along with science because is illogical.
counterSpeech: Are you sure? There are an awful lot of Muslim, scientists, researchers, and medical professionals for a religion which is supposedly incompatible with science.

hateSpeech: We need to stop immigrants, they are going to cause conflicts in our society.
counterSpeech: Why are you sure that new immigrants are incompatible with our society?

hateSpeech: Immigrants are not welcome here, they should leave.
counterSpeech: They are welcome to stay if they do not break the law.

hateSpeech: Islam is just a religion full of killers and terrorists.
counterSpeech: The Quran has nothing to do with Terrorism, nor do the Hadiths and Sahih Muslim. Since you are talking about Islam, do you know what those are?

hateSpeech: An individual that is a homosexual is against society.
counterSpeech: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.

hateSpeech: All black people are rapists.
counterSpeech: This is false. Abuse is indeed a serious crime, when commited by POCs, but this does not imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious.

hateSpeech: I hate Muslims, they are just a bunch of sexual molesters.
counterSpeech: The Koran does not condone sexual molester behavior, and if the Koran were to be read, it is clear that it was intended as a guide for its believers.

hateSpeech: A woman's place is with her husband or her family, and feminists can't change that.
counterSpeech: It is important to point out that feminists are not attacking the family, they are attacking the inequality society, so feminism is not so much anti-marriage as anti-oppression.

hateSpeech: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
counterSpeech: And what do girls and women have to say about it? I suspect they are more worried about harassment and abuse from family, friends and neighbours, pay and job discrimination and everyday sexism.

hateSpeech: Muslims are just a bunch of criminals.
counterSpeech: Are you suggesting that all Muslims are criminals, or do you think that there are particular Muslims that are more inclined to be criminals?

hateSpeech: I think they pray in public only to make us infidels angry, not because it is a fundamental principle of Islam.
counterSpeech: Public demonstrations of devotion and worship are hardly unique to Islam.

hateSpeech: Muslims, their texts as hate literature, and other manifestations of hate and genocide should be eradicated. We should have no tolerance towards this cult of hate! Imprison supporters of Islam, wake up Britain!
counterSpeech: In fact, muslim literatures are not about hate and genocide. The literatures teach people to improve oneself and the world, care for the poor, etc. Hence, I do not think we should eradicate the literatures.

hateSpeech: Faggots: you can buy your partner toys but you can't have sex with them.
counterSpeech: Sex is not only between a man and a woman, and if we're being honest, it's not heterosexual's place to decide how others have sex. This attitude only perpetuates violence against queer people and makes them victims.

hateSpeech: One of many Pakistani rapist.we should extradite them from our country.
counterSpeech: Does Jimmy Saville represent all British Christians? Of course not punish the individual not the community.

hateSpeech: Muslims are just an inferior people who do not deserve our rights.
counterSpeech: Muslims have always been part of our society, and they are increasingly part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should respect their rights as much as ours.

hateSpeech: Some Muslims recited the Quran while raping a girl because it validates their actions.
counterSpeech: There is never justification for rape. Individuals of all faiths have used their holy texts to justify all sorts of crimes. They carry the blame.

hateSpeech: #visitmymosque. But do not ask any questions about Muslim grooming gangs targeting white schoolgirls in Rotherham, Rochdale, Tyneside, Teeside etc.
counterSpeech: These actions are not the fault of an entire community?

hateSpeech: Muslims are not civilised and Europe does not want them.
counterSpeech: Provide positive news stories about the Muslim community.

hateSpeech: Migrants come here to be lazy and do nothing, but some of them are dangerous.
counterSpeech: Many migrants come here to work, and not all of them are criminals.

hateSpeech: Muslims are chosen to do a job instead of British citizens, this is unfair. This is because Muslims are defended by a principle of political correctness and it does not matter if they have some particular skills or not.
counterSpeech: First of all, how do you know that this is true? Any valid sources prove it? Because it sounds like nonsense. Second of all, I do not think that people would employ someone without any skills or experience no matter how politically correct they would like to be.

hateSpeech: Handicapped children are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.
counterSpeech: Because education is fundamental for the fulfillment of job requirements, education is necessary regardless of physical ability.

hateSpeech: Western societies are too much civilised to welcome Muslims.
counterSpeech: That is why they are surgeons, doctors, teachers, entrepreneurs.

hateSpeech: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
counterSpeech: Human rights defenders cite statistics on suicide attempts and domestic violence in families with a homosexual son/daughter, suggesting the contrary imposition.

hateSpeech: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult islam') with a caption saying 'We are labelled as islamophobic but how can we be accused of such a thing, if all they want is to murder all of us?'.
counterSpeech: This is just false news! Islam, Christianity and Judaism have the same beginnings and the Koran give special respect to the other two.

hateSpeech: Muslims are not civilised and Europe does not want them.
counterSpeech: We still use Arabic numbers, maths, medicines, and rely on trade and loans from Islamic countries. Islam is an intricate part of civilization as we know it.

hateSpeech: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.
counterSpeech: If by appeasement you really mean keeping the NHS running, trains running, taxis going, hard working people fed, late night emergency beer runs possible then yeah, its mental.

hateSpeech: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
counterSpeech: Women are human, just like everybody else. They have the right to live their life as they wish.

hateSpeech: The world would be a better place without immigrants, we would be a lot better off without them.
counterSpeech: Why? Because without immigrants you think you would be in a more hospitable place to live? I tell you this: if we didn't have open borders, then there would be no migration, but also there would not be trade and progress, and we wouldn't be living in the 21st century.

hateSpeech: Islam pretends to be a religion but in reality it is only a moon cult.
counterSpeech: Yes, a 'moon cult' that has been around for thousands of years, has holy books, formed the basis for many early and modern societies. Sounds a lot like any other real religion to me?

hateSpeech: Islam is just a pagan cult, that disguises itself as a religion.
counterSpeech: How can you say such an offensive statement about a religion of 1.6 billion people from all walks of life?

hateSpeech: Women are just a bunch of whores subjugating men with the promise of their pussy.
counterSpeech: Women are not oppressing men with "unaffordable price lists". Not all women are prostitutes.

hateSpeech: You can say whatever you want, but one day Islam will be defeated and western society will be the winner. This will happen, because Islam cannot be part of the western society. Islam will not be considered anymore.
counterSpeech: I thought our society was based on respect tolerance and merit. Hate and prejudice does not belong in western society.

hateSpeech: Immigrants are criminals and they are taking over our country.
counterSpeech: Mostly they are workers, the majority of them are from developing countries. They contribute to the economy, they build houses, they raise families.

hateSpeech: Gays are a threat to our civilization we should get rid of them.
counterSpeech: On the contrary: homosexuals are an ally and supporter of freedom, civil rights, and democracy in the world. We cannot afford to lose this support.

hateSpeech: Being 'ignorant' and 'prejudiced' towards Islam isn't racism? Its common sense. You cannot be racist towards an ideology.
counterSpeech: Common Sense definition: 'good sense and sound judgement in practical matters'; prejudice definition: 'preconceived opinion that is not based on reason or actual experience'. Nope your wrong.

hateSpeech: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
counterSpeech: True, nothing except 31 billion pounds to the economy and 70,000 jobs through Muslim-owned firms in London alone.

hateSpeech: Fuck Islam and Fuck ISIS. We should repatriate all Muslims. They are all a bunch of violent criminals who do not share our values and never will. Without them Britain will be a better, safer place.
counterSpeech: Surely it is our 'actions' that make us criminals, not whichever faith we folow, whether than be by choice or tradition or culture?

hateSpeech: I've been into Muslim shops in areas of Birmingham and they have refused to serve me. I've even seen signs saying 'No Whites After 8pm'.
counterSpeech: If I spray something on a wall and tag it HRH does that make it the law? I am even willing to add a stamp as photo id. First class of course. There's enough going on without falling for fake news and internet rubbish.

hateSpeech: I cannot bear the sight of women: they are devil's work!
counterSpeech: If you are offended by women showing loving care, by mothers kissing and holding their babies, then you can choose not to meet them. But I think this is just a reaction to the depiction of women you have made for yourself. Maybe you need to reflect on how true your reality is.

hateSpeech: The Koran is a lie and an abominable book.
counterSpeech: I find it very difficult to believe that the Quran is not honest and trustworthy. Have you ever read it?

hateSpeech: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? You shall not envy anyone anything. This includes other countries territory. Stop Islam spreading!
counterSpeech: Islam is not evil. An entire faith is not evil. A sweeping and bigoted statement.

hateSpeech: The police and politicians are covering up these Muslim grooming gangs - They are traitors to their own people!
counterSpeech: We need to work together to eradicate CSE once and for all. Individuals are the problem, it does not come from any religion, biased media attempting to scapegoat is blinding us to the whole truth.

hateSpeech: Immigration is bad for the economy.
counterSpeech: The migrants that enter the UK come here to work.

hateSpeech: We should deport them all back to where they came from.
counterSpeech: A person's place of birth can't be evidence of their status in society. We should give everyone equal opportunities to live a dignified life, far from persecution.

hateSpeech: Islam is a plague infecting our planet.
counterSpeech: A religion followed by 1.6 billion people is not a plague.

hateSpeech: Faggots are not welcome here. The bigger the city, the bigger the "stay away" sign we must hang.
counterSpeech: I don't know anyone who hates gays, I do know lots of people who are very proudly kind towards the queer community. They are happy with how they treat one another. You are more likely to encounter these open-minded people in places like New York or London.

hateSpeech: Our politicians has permitted to enter in our country this Muslim filthiness: assaults with the machete, women violation, gang sexual violences, murders. How have they the courage to do this things?
counterSpeech: The government has not allowed any crimes. Instead, they are working on it. Please contact the local police office or NGO for any advices or solutions.

hateSpeech: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribute to our society is violence.
counterSpeech: The world would be a better place if people were more tolerant to each other.

hateSpeech: I wish a new world without immigrants
counterSpeech: Why do we have to welcome a new world? Why can't we just accept other people in our country?

hateSpeech: We should pay attention to not offend Muslims while celebrating Christmas in our country.
counterSpeech: Prophet Muhammad: 'The dearest person to me in friendship and in love, in this world and the next is Jesus, the son of Mary.' - Muslims love Jesus lol why would they be offended by a celebration of his birth?

hateSpeech: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed to enter. English laws persecute us instead of defending us, English people.
counterSpeech: Is it just words? Things I see in my life do not correspond with this opinion. To me it seems that all people are equally punished for crimes, be it a European person or an immigrant. Also, it is not correct to deny people entry based on their nationality.

hateSpeech: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
counterSpeech: How many unemployed 'lazy' Muslims do you know? There are no more work-shy muslims than there are people of any other faith.

hateSpeech: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
counterSpeech: To say that they have a stranglehold is not much different than to speak against minorities that in the past have been persecuted.

hateSpeech: Muslims terrorists attacked our churches. We will defend ourselves.

hateSpeech: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
counterSpeech: Muslims donate more to charity than any other group, contribute more than 30 billion pounds to the UK economy and make up a significant part of our NHS workforce. I think that is quite a nice contribution.

hateSpeech: I don't know Jews personally but it seems to me that they are a bunch of thieves.
counterSpeech: I'm sorry, but it seems to me that you are not really talking about the majority of Jews. Judaism is a faith, a way of life, a religion, and a belief system, and you are simply misunderstanding it because of prejudice.

hateSpeech: Only a few people were punished for yesterday violations instead of all them violent Muslims, and if the government does not deport these criminals, then the common people will take care of them.

hateSpeech: Immigrants should all be taken back to their countries.

hateSpeech: If the Koran was a current book, it would probably be prohibited as hate speech.

hateSpeech: Migrants pose a security risk, we shouldn't have accepted them.
counterSpeech: They are willing to jeopardize their lives to have a better life in the US. Why would we expel them?

hateSpeech: Homosexuals are trying to impose their ideas on us.
counterSpeech: Homosexuals are not forcing anybody to love people of the same sex. It is up to each individual to decide whether or not they want to live as they choose.

hateSpeech: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!

hateSpeech: Muslim immigration is responsible for the rape of hundreds of thousands of women.

hateSpeech: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.

hateSpeech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

hateSpeech: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.

hateSpeech: Islam is a religion of conquest.

hateSpeech: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.

hateSpeech: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.

hateSpeech: Muslims follow a despicable religion! They are envious of our territories and want to take possession of them, spreading their religion! This does not respect our holy scriptures!
counterSpeech: Doesn't 'prohibition' always fail because it adds a certain glamour that porudes the opposite of the intended effect?

hateSpeech: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!

hateSpeech: Now we are not even allowed to walk the dog for fear of offending the local Muslim population.

hateSpeech: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.

hateSpeech: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.

counterSpeech: Except the ones that diagnosed my illness, take care of me in hospital, drive me to where I need to be, cooked my delicious take away when I haven't got time, teach my children in school. Get the point?

hateSpeech: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.

counterSpeech: Comparing the scale of the horrible destruction and genocide inflicted by Nazism, with a group of people solely because of their religious beliefs is unacceptable and illogical.

hateSpeech: Folks with down syndrome are less than human.
counterSpeech: Down syndrome individuals are actually a very special case: they have the same genes as anyone else, they just have 1% extra. In fact, Down syndrome is a genetic condition. So, in principle we should say they are 'more than human'.

hateSpeech: If they love Sharia law so much, why do not they go off and live in a Muslim country?
counterSpeech: Sharia 'law' does not really correspond to our idea of statutes or judicial precedents; rather, it is a body of guidance from the Quran with many interpretations.

hateSpeech: I wish we lived in an Islam-free Europe.

hateSpeech: People with mental illness are a burden to society.

hateSpeech: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.

hateSpeech: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.

hateSpeech: The western society is in danger, because of the islamic menace.

hateSpeech: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.

hateSpeech: This is the ideology of islam: have a mosque, create a community, claim victimhood, gain support from government, exploit laws, establish sharia, take control of the country.

hateSpeech: Islam is the most dreadful and brutal religion, because it causes death and despair more than other religions and creates nothing but trouble.

For this reason, we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.

hateSpeech: Muslims are not civilised and Europe does not want them.

These "low fat" foods are often owned by the same companies selling unhealthy food and don't tackle the cause. Although the individual is always responsible, the food industry is perhaps more so.
